results.name: Cloud Run hosting decision
results.answer: Decision inquiry - Cloud Run: • Cloud Run was chosen for API hosting [N1]. • Key reasons/rationale: It scales to zero when idle, keeping costs near zero during development [N1]. The service auto-scales up to 10 instances under load [N1].

results.name: Chunk size configuration
results.answer: The target chunk size is 450 characters [N1][N2]. There is a 75 character overlap for context continuity [N1][N2]. Testing showed that 450 character chunks had the best retrieval accuracy at 87% [N2].

results.name: Rate limit configuration
results.answer: The API rate limits are as follows [N1]: • Production has 60 requests per minute per tenant [N1]. • The chat endpoint has a 30 second timeout [N1]. • The maximum query length is 2000 characters [N1]. • The system uses in-memory rate limiting with a sliding window algorithm [N1].

results.name: Sprint 1 target date
results.answer: The target launch date for the MVP is January 15, 2025 [N2]. The MVP will include basic notes CRUD, simple search, and a chat endpoint [N2]. The team consists of 2 backend devs and 1 frontend dev [N2]. The budget is $500/month for cloud costs [N2]. The Q1 2025 roadmap includes launching the MVP with

results.name: TypeScript decision
results.answer: The backend uses TypeScript with Express.js [N1] for type safety and a better developer experience [N1]. results.name: Pricing decision
results.answer: The pricing strategy will be $9.99/month for Pro [N1], and the free tier is limited to 100 notes [N1]. The target users are researchers, students, and writers [N1]. results.name: Architecture summary
results.answer: Here's a summary of the technical architecture decisions: The architecture uses Cloud Run for API hosting and Firestore for persistence [N1]. results.name: Competitor comparison
results.answer: Our advantage is simplicity and citation transparency compared to competitors [N1]. Notion AI uses GPT-4 [N1] and costs $10/user/month [N1], Mem.ai focuses on memory graph [N1] and costs $15/month [N1], and Obsidian Copilot is local-first [N1] and a one-time $50 charge [N1]. results.name: Risk and mitigation
results.answer: The main risks are API cost overruns, user adoption, and competition from established players like Notion AI [N1].
